amendment.description: To require reports on the recommendations of the Defense Science Board regarding the management of the biometrics program of the Department of Defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4803 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4803 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S8599; text: CR S8599) To require reports on the recommendations of the Defense Science Board regarding the management of the biometrics program of the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4803 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4803 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Byrd.
